content: How are they represented in Argonaut / US Core? I would sort of expect them in DiagnosticReport - but its profile says only LAB.
A possible alternative would be DocumentReference but it does not seems quite right
Or are they simply out of scope?
We have talked about this before.. Imaging reports not par of laboratory reporting but is part of clinical notes see US Core R4
Thanks - so not supported / covered is STU3 ?

Alcohol, Pregnancy is not covered by US Core. If the US implementers can agree on something and test and pilot it then it would be great to add. ( or US regulators specify something) ... Those are the criteria for addition to US core
